mention.text: scientist-in-charge of the Hawaiian Volcano Observatory
an undersea mountain named Loihi Volcanologists believe Loihi eventually could emerge as the ninth Hawaiian island `` Loihi has grown about 10,100 feet from the Pacific floor
southeast of the Big Island of Hawaii
